dataScience.title: Hands-On Machine Learning with Scikit-Learn, Keras, and TensorFlow
dataScience.author: Aurelion Geron
dataScience.impact: In my opinion, this book is the most comprehensive single resource to learn Machine Learning

dataScience.title: Approaching (Almost) Any Machine Learning Problem
dataScience.author: Abhishek Thakur
dataScience.impact: Very Hands-On. Abhishek's fluency is out of any scale. You should check out his YouTube channel

personalGrowth.title: Seven Habits of Highly Effective People
personalGrowth.author: Stephen R. Covey
personalGrowth.impact: Personal #1. The book helped me redefining Independence. I learned the word "proactive" which became a life-changer.
topQuotes: We see the world, not as it is, but as we are â”€ or, as we are conditioned to see it.
If I really want to improve my situation, I can work on the one thing over which I have control - myself.
Happiness, like unhappiness, is a proactive choice.

personalGrowth.title: How to Win Friends & Influence People
personalGrowth.author: Dale Carnegie
personalGrowth.impact: Personal #1. Made me realize my life far from an independent one. I learned the word "proactive" which became a life-changer.
topQuotes: Only knowledge that is used sticks in your mind.
There is only one way to get the best of an argument -- and that is to avoid it.

personalGrowth.title: You Are a Badass
personalGrowth.author: Jen Sincero
personalGrowth.impact: Made me realize I'm still shitting my pants when things get uncomfortable. Also, I was lying to myself this wasn't true
